text: Trump's Iowa lead shrinks significantly as Kamala Harris replaces Biden, Iowa Poll shows  —  The nationally recognized Iowa Poll's first test of Kamala Harris' strength against Donald Trump indicates she's a more formidable opponent than President Biden in solid-red Iowa
